title: I Am Octavio

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot your fists at a player, attacking them.
- Fire an octopus missile at a player, also attacking them. Also select 2 alternate targets. Usable until your defense is reduced to Powerful.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your presence is announced day 1. All players have the option to self target, even if the host decides it would not do anything. Players cannot intentionally attack themselves.
- When attacking a player, if they self target, they reflect the fist back to you.
- With the missile, you first fire it at your first target. If your first target self targets, it goes to your second target, then your third, then you attack yourself.
- If you get hit by the missile, or get hit by 2 fists, your defense is reduced to Powerful.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 3767
*GYAH HA HA! I'ma remix your face!*
